hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Uqbah bin 'Amir that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:"Allah, the Mighty and Sublime, will admit three people into Paradise for one arrow: The one who makes it, intending it to be used for a good cause, the one who shoots it, and one who passes it to him

chapter.ara-name: باب ثَوَابِ مَنْ رَمَى بِسَهْمٍ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ .
chapter.eng-name: The Reward Of The One Who Shoots An Arrow In The Cause Of Allah, The Mighty And Sublime
